Name: Lets Encrypt - Create SSL Certificate
Description: Procures an X.509 SSL Certificate from the [Letâ€™s Encrypt](https://letsencrypt.org) Certificate Authority using the [Automatic Certificate Management Environment (ACME)](https://ietf-wg-acme.github.io/acme/) protocol.

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
<#
 ----- Lets Encrypt - Create SSL Certificate ----- 
    Paul Marston @paulmarsy (paul@marston.me)
Links
    https://github.com/OctopusDeploy/Library/commits/master/step-templates/letsencrypt-create-ssl-certificate.json
#>

$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'

function Get-OctopusSetting {
    param([Parameter(Position = 0, Mandatory)][string]$Name, [Parameter(Position = 1)]$DefaultValue)
    $formattedName = 'Octopus.Action.{0}' -f $Name
    if ($OctopusParameters.ContainsKey($formattedName)) {
        $value = $OctopusParameters[$formattedName]
        if ($DefaultValue -is [int]) { return ([int]::Parse($value)) }
        if ($DefaultValue -is [bool]) { return ([System.Convert]::ToBoolean($value)) }
        if ($DefaultValue -is [array] -or $DefaultValue -is [hashtable] -or $DefaultValue -is [pscustomobject]) { return (ConvertFrom-Json -InputObject $value) }
        return $value
    }
    else { return $DefaultValue }
}
function Test-String {
    param([Parameter(Position=0)]$InputObject,[switch]$ForAbsence)

    $hasNoValue = [System.String]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($InputObject)
    if ($ForAbsence) { $hasNoValue }
    else { -not $hasNoValue }
}
filter Out-Verbose {
    Write-Verbose ($_ | Out-String)
}
filter Out-Indented {
    $_ | Out-String | % Trim | % Split "`n" | % { "`t$_" }  
}
if (!(Get-Module ACMESharp -ListAvailable)) {
    Write-Host 'Installing ACME PowerShell Module...'
    Install-Module -Name ACMESharp -AllowClobber -RequiredVersion 0.8.1 -Force
}
Write-Host 'Importing ACME PowerShell Module...'
Import-Module ACMESharp

$BaseService = Get-OctopusSetting BaseService 'LetsEncrypt'
Write-Host "Initializing ACME Vault for $BaseService..."
Initialize-ACMEVault -BaseService $BaseService -Force

Write-Host 'Creating new registration...'
New-ACMERegistration -Contacts ('mailto:{0}' -f $Param_MailTo) -AcceptTos | Out-Indented

Write-Host "Requesting Domain Identifier for $Param_Domain..."
New-ACMEIdentifier -Dns $Param_Domain -Alias $Param_Domain | Out-Indented

Write-Host 'Initiating Domain Ownership Challenge...'
$challengeType = ($Param_ChallengeType -split ',')[0]
$handler = ($Param_ChallengeType -split ',')[1]
$handlerParameters = @{}
if (Test-String $Param_WebSiteRef) {
    $handlerParameters.Add('WebSiteRef', $Param_WebSiteRef)
}
$instructionsPath = [System.IO.Path]::GetTempFileName()
if ($handler -ieq 'manual') {
    $handlerParameters.Add('WriteOutPath', $instructionsPath)
    Remove-Item -Path $instructionsPath -Force
}
$identifier = Complete-ACMEChallenge -IdentifierRef $Param_Domain -ChallengeType $challengeType -Handler $handler -HandlerParameters $handlerParameters -Repeat

if ($handler -ieq 'manual') {
    Get-Content -Path $instructionsPath -Raw | Tee-Object -Variable challenge | Out-Indented
    Remove-Item -Path $instructionsPath -Force
    
    Set-OctopusVariable ACMEChallenge $challenge
    $waitTime = Get-OctopusSetting ManualWait 300
    Write-Host "Domain Verification instructions added to Octopus variable 'Octopus.Action[$($OctopusParameters['Octopus.Action.Name'])].Output.ACMEChallenge"
    Write-Host "Waiting $waitTime seconds before submitting challenge completion..."
    Start-Sleep -Seconds $waitTime
}

$identifier = Submit-ACMEChallenge -IdentifierRef $Param_Domain -ChallengeType $challengeType
while ($identifier.Status -eq 'pending') {
    Write-Host "Domain Verification is $($identifier.Status), waiting..."
    Start-Sleep -Seconds 20
    $identifier = Update-ACMEIdentifier -IdentifierRef $Param_Domain    
}

Write-Host "Domain Verification is $($identifier.Status)"
$identifier.Challenges | ? Status -ne pending | % ChallengePart | Out-Indented
if ($identifier.Status -ne 'valid') {
    $errorJson = $identifier.Challenges | ? Status -eq invalid | % ChallengePart | % Error | ConvertTo-Json
    Get-ACMEVaultProfile | % VaultParameters | % RootPath | Get-ChildItem -File -Filter '00-VAULT' | Get-Content | Out-Verbose
    throw "Domain Verification is $($identifier.Status)`n$errorJson"
}

Write-Host 'Generating CSR...'
New-ACMECertificate -Alias $Param_Domain -IdentifierRef $Param_Domain -Generate | Out-Verbose

Write-Host 'Submitting CSR...'
Submit-ACMECertificate -CertificateRef $Param_Domain | Out-Indented

while (Test-String $certificate.IssuerSerialNumber -ForAbsence) {
    Write-Host 'Waiting for certificate to be issued...'
    Start-Sleep -Seconds 20
    $certificate = Update-ACMECertificate -CertificateRef $Param_Domain
}

Write-Host 'Certificate has been issued...'
$certificate | Out-Indented

Write-Host "Exporting PFX (PKCS#12) certificate file to $Param_PfxFilePath..."
Get-ACMECertificate -CertificateRef $Param_Domain -ExportPkcs12 $Param_PfxFilePath -Overwrite | Out-Verbose

if ($Param_ImportCert -ieq 'True') {
    Write-Host 'Importing certificate to local machine store...'
    Import-PfxCertificate -CertStoreLocation Cert:\LocalMachine\My -Exportable -FilePath $Param_PfxFilePath
    
    Get-ChildItem -Path Cert:\LocalMachine\My | ? Thumbprint -eq $certificate.Thumbprint | % {
        Write-Host "Setting certificate Friendly Name..."
        $_.FriendlyName = $Param_Domain
    }
}

Parameters.Name: Param_Domain
Parameters.Label: Domain
Parameters.HelpText: Domain the certificate should be issued to e.g. **octopus.com**

Parameters.Name: Param_MailTo
Parameters.Label: Contact Email
Parameters.HelpText: Contact email address used during registration for certificate [expiration emails](https://letsencrypt.org/docs/expiration-emails/) and to accept the [terms of service](https://letsencrypt.org/repository/).

Parameters.Name: Param_ChallengeType
Parameters.Label: Domain Verification Challenge Type
Parameters.HelpText:
If running on a Web server that answers to the domain name, and using Windows IIS 7.0 or greater, IIS can be updated automatically to serve content that will prove domain ownership and control.

Alternatively if a manual verification option is selected instructions will be displayed in the log.

Additional information can be found in the [ACME PowerShell Module Documentation](https://github.com/ebekker/ACMESharp/wiki/Quick-Start#5-handle-the-challenge-to-prove-domain-ownership).

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
http-01,iis|HTTP Challenge (Automated via IIS)
http-01,manual|HTTP Challenge (Manual)
dns-01,manual|DNS Challenge (Manual)

Parameters.Name: Param_WebSiteRef
Parameters.Label: IIS Web Site Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the IIS Web Site that handles HTTP traffic for the domain when using the **HTTP Challenge (Automated via IIS)** verification option e.g. **Default Web Site**

Parameters.Name: Param_PfxFilePath
Parameters.Label: PFX Export File
Parameters.HelpText: Exports the certificate and related assets in PKCS#12 archive (.PFX used by Windows and IIS) e.g. **D:\octopus.com.pfx**

Parameters.Name: Param_ImportCert
Parameters.Label: Import Certificate?
Parameters.HelpText: Imports the certificate to the local machine store and sets the **Friendly Name** attribute to the domain name.
